title: Zz'rot isn't exactly viable anymore...
body: Just thought I would ask if anyone thought it was actually worth purchasing.

replies.body:
While it isn't gold efficient without it's effects (The stats are worth about 2465 gold) it can be used to hold a lane, shove towers, and create pressure and is one of 3 double resistance items. The heathregen of it is amazing if you play someone who benefits from % health regen (while Soraka level 1 would only get 3 bonus hp per 5 Heimer would get a bonus 16 hp per 5 level 1). 

It's a solid item for tanks however it isn't as good as it once was but is still definitely viable.
Have you tried to hold a lane with zz since they last changed it? The minions die too fast to clear a minion wave.
Yes actually. I find it is still possible as the rot minions will damage enemy minions and thus enabling your wave to push. It is NOT as effective however still works.

zzrot/banner/yorick ulty, i call it the 2 minute turret

take a turret almost every 2 minutes (3 if youvwait for tele)

never underestimate that item in bronze
